<MethodEndpoint

Returns the report of customer operations from the accounting service.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"startDate","in":"query","description":"The report start date.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"}},{"name":"endDate","in":"query","description":"The report end date.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"}},{"name":"participantName","in":"query","description":"The participant name.","schema":{"type":"string","example":"some text"}},{"name":"credit","in":"query","description":"Specifies whether to include credit operations in the report. The default value is true.","schema":{"type":"boolean","example":true}},{"name":"offset","in":"query","description":"The number of items to skip for pagination.
